title: Implement real-time data synchronization system
description: Build bidirectional data synchronization that keeps multiple systems in sync with conflict resolution and automatic retry mechanisms for data consistency
iWant: real-time data synchronization between primary and backup systems
soThat: I can ensure data consistency within 5 seconds and prevent data conflicts
acceptanceCriteria: Data changes sync across systems within 5 seconds
Conflict resolution handles simultaneous updates automatically
Failed sync operations retry up to 3 times before alerting
Sync status dashboard shows real-time system health
